title: C++ Math
text: C++ has many functions that allows you to perform mathematical tasks on numbers.

title: Max and min
text:
The max(x,y) function can be used to find the highest value of x and
y:

And the min(x,y) function can be used to find the lowest value of 
x 
and y:

title: C++  <cmath> Library
text:
Other functions, such as sqrt (square root), round (rounds a number) and log 
(natural logarithm), can be found in the <cmath> header 
file:

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
// Include the cmath library#include <cmath>cout << 
  sqrt(64);cout << round(2.6);cout << log(2);

title: Complete Math Reference
text: For a complete reference of Math functions, go to our C++ Math Reference.
